bilingual.target: 鲁迅的小说揭示了社会的许多问题。
这种政策加剧了社会的不平等。

bilingual.source: Social progress has led to radical changes.
bilingual.target: 社会的进步带来了沧海桑田。
种族歧视会导致社会的不公正。

bilingual.source: The enforcement of laws ensures social stability.
bilingual.target: 法律的强制执行确保了社会的稳定。

list.abstract: social（英[ˈsəʊʃl]，美[ˈsoʊʃl]），英语单词。可做名词或形容词用。做名词时，指社交聚会；做形容词时，指社会的、群居的、社会性的等。英语短语有social network（社交网络），例句为Social bonds are created among individuals.（他们之间产生了社会纽带。） 形容词类的近义词为gregarious，名词类的近义词有sodality、get-together；反义词为unsocial。

yingyinNormal.en: Love has meaning, yes. Social utility, social bonding, child rearing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爱是有意义的，没错，社会效益，人际交往，繁衍后代。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. I followed the social protocol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，我遵循了社交礼仪。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you often experience social anxiety?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否会经常产生社交焦虑？

yingyinNormal.en: Here's another truth: Social Security is dying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这一点也是事实：社会保险在崩溃。

yingyinNormal.en: I agree. The social sciences are largely hokum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问得好，社会学家很大程度是忽悠。

yingyinNormal.en: Low self-esteem. Social anxiety. Sexual insecurity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自尊低落。社交焦虑。性生活不安全感。

yingyinNormal.en: Today marks the 80th Anniversary of the Social Security Act.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是《社会保险法案》的80周年纪念日。

yingyinNormal.en: He shoots. Yes, he shoots. Like every social-climbing banker shoots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他会狩猎吧。是的，每个想往上爬的银行家也都会。

yingyinNormal.en: Because it's got bravado. It's social status. No, you know what? It's even more than that. It's social currency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这让他们感觉到他们是前卫的，这也是他们社会地位的一种认可。你们知道么？更进一步说它代表了一种社会文化

yingyinNormal.en: I'm on vacation. Social convention dictates that I let my hair down at a local watering hole. Social convention is stupid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在度假，按照社会惯例我应该来当地酒吧放松一下。社会惯例就是个屁。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyone else see the flaw in this plan? We need a social catalyst.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们发现这个计划的瑕疵没？我们需要社交方面的催化剂。

yingyinNormal.en: But the fact is the social relationships have a lot of advantages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但实际上社会关系带给我们很多好处。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, when it comes to social skills, I've mastered the big three.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经掌握了社交三大技巧。

yingyinNormal.en: I hear the freshmen just joined the high school social network. Not me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我听说你们这些新生加入高中社交网络了。我没有。

yingyinNormal.en: We love people who have died. Where's the social utility in that? None.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们爱那些逝去的人，这有什么社会效益？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: We live in a social world, where we do things as people favors as a part of reputation, the way we think of ourselves, the way they think of us is a social world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个具有社会性，我们需要做人们赞成的事，我们思考自己的方式，考虑别人的方式，这是社会性世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Try telling him it's a non-optional social convention. What? Just do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你试试告诉他这是一个没得选择的社交习俗。什么？照我说的做。

yingyinNormal.en: She really needs to tone down on the social niceties. It's embarrassing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她真该改改她的大小姐脾气，搞的挺尴尬的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a non-optional social convention. Oh. Fair enough. He came with a manual.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个没得选择的社交习俗。那倒是。他很有规则性的。

yingyinNormal.en: A social network is something that has its roots firmly planted in our history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 社交网络深深植根于我们的历史当中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Much of our <highlight>social</highlight> life is like that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的大部分社会生活都是这样的。

examination_example.sentence: In response, the American Academy formed the Commission on the Humanities and <highlight>Social</highlight> Sciences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为回应，美国科学院成立了人文和社会科学委员会。

examination_example.sentence: Despite these factors, many <highlight>social</highlight> scientists seem reluctant to tackle such problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管有这些因素，许多社会科学家似乎不愿意解决这样的问题。

sense_info_list.en: relating to leisure activities that involve meeting other people

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>social</highlight> situation, eye contact with another person can show that you are paying attention in a friendly way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社交场合，与另一个人的眼神交流可以表明你在以友好的方式关注对方。

examination_example.sentence: Most Americans rely on <highlight>social</highlight> media to check daily headlines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数美国人依靠社交媒体查看每日头条新闻。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, the choice to share news on <highlight>social</highlight> media may be the heart of the issue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，选择在社交媒体上分享新闻可能是问题的核心。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They bear fewer <highlight>social</highlight> responsibilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们承担的社会责任更少。

examination_example.sentence: Cooperate with <highlight>social</highlight> scientists in their research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与社会科学家合作进行研究。

examination_example.sentence: They don't seem to care about the <highlight>social</highlight> cost of tourism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们似乎不关心旅游的社会成本。

examination_example.sentence: People post their lives on <highlight>social</highlight> media for the world to see.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们在社交媒体上发布自己的生活，让全世界都看到。

examination_example.sentence: The so-called "ghostwriting" can take various forms: books, articles, autobiographies, and even <highlight>social</highlight> media posts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所谓的“代笔”可以采用各种形式：书籍、文章、自传，甚至社交媒体帖子。

examination_example.sentence: There is a direct connection from Marconi to today's <highlight>social</highlight> media, search engines, and program streaming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi与当今的社交媒体、搜索引擎和节目流媒体播放有着直接的联系。

sense_info_list.en: relating to or based on rank in a particular society

examination_example.sentence: People's <highlight>social</highlight> mobility.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人的社会流动性。

examination_example.sentence: At one level, Marconi could be fiercely autonomous and independent of the constraints of his own <highlight>social</highlight> class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，马可尼可以非常自立，不受自己社会阶层的限制。

examination_example.sentence: Gather gene data from people of all <highlight>social</highlight> classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从所有社会阶层收集基因数据。

社会生活；社会生命；社交生活

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: As far as <highlight>social</highlight> mobility is concerned, San Jose beat many other progressive cities in America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就社会流动性而言，圣何塞击败了美国许多其他进步城市。

examination_example.sentence: San Jose was among the best cities in America for poor kids to move up the <highlight>social</highlight> ladder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 圣何塞是美国贫困儿童提升社会地位的最佳城市之一。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Social</highlight> order is breaking down in many countries because of food shortages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于食品短缺，许多国家的社会秩序正面临着崩溃。

examination_example.sentence: In one study, students were told their <highlight>social</highlight> position in school is not unchangeable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项研究中，学生被告知他们在学校的社会地位不是一成不变的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Social</highlight> media addiction is a threat to our health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交媒体成瘾对我们的健康是一种威胁。

examination_example.sentence: At first the researchers of the most recent study found residents in assisted living facilities gave higher scores on <highlight>social</highlight> interaction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项最新研究的研究人员首先发现，生活在辅助生活设施中的居民在社会互动方面得分较高。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 社会的; 有关社会的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Which hotel best suits people who enjoy an active <highlight>social</highlight> life?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪家酒店最适合享受活跃社交生活的人？

examination_example.sentence: If you love <highlight>social</highlight> hostels, this is the best hostel for you in Rome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你喜欢招待所，这是罗马最好的招待所。

examination_example.sentence: They are likely to be influenced by <highlight>social</highlight> beliefs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能会受到社会信仰的影响。

examination_example.sentence: To learn to use <highlight>social</highlight> media, because it allows them to get to know the outside world better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学会使用社交媒体，因为它能让他们更好地了解外部世界。

examination_example.sentence: When a student attacks a professor on the <highlight>social</highlight> media, the language used actually says more about the student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当学生在社交媒体上攻击教授时，使用的语言实际上更多地反映了学生的情况。

examination_example.sentence: I guess that there's probably some demanding work schedule, or <highlight>social</highlight> anxiety around stepping up to help for an unknown sport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我猜可能有一些苛刻的工作日程，或者社交焦虑围绕着帮助一项未知的运动。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They are not able to develop the same <highlight>social</highlight> skills as children from big families.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们无法像来自大家庭的孩子那样发展社交技能。

examination_example.sentence: I also advise you to take an active part in sports and <highlight>social</highlight> activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还建议你积极参加各种体育运动和社交活动。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Social</highlight> networking is also changing the way some doctors and patients communicate with each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交网络也在改变一些医生和病人之间的交流方式。

examination_example.sentence: Tea is good for people's health and plays an important role in Chinese <highlight>social</highlight> life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 茶有利于人们的健康，在中国人的社会生活中发挥着重要作用。

examination_example.sentence: He used his pen to fight <highlight>social</highlight> inequality and gave voice to the poor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他利用手中的笔与社会不平等作斗争，为穷人发声。

examination_example.sentence: With the development of economics (经济), the problem of the left-behind children (留守儿童) has become a serious <highlight>social</highlight> problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着经济发展，留守儿童问题已经成为一个严重的社会问题。
